item.description: This is our first dance after the summer break.  Be sure to come and bring your friends.  Dance the night away to the music of our great DJ - Rockin’ Ron from 8 pm to 12 am.  There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for you to enjoy.  Dress to impress and door prizes.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 164 Central Street:  I‑84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end and turn right, at 2nd light look for facility on right, parking on either side of building.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at the admission's table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Sweetheart Dance
